recommended_degree: Administrasi Bisnis, Logistik, Teknik Industri, Akuntansi, Manajemen (Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as a Supply Chain Intern to ensuring smooth supply chain processes. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting in checking and validating data across BC, Slimstock, PLM, and other supply chain systems.
2. Supporting data migration activities and helping ensure information accuracy and completeness.
3. Providing general administrative support and coordinating with internal departments as needed.

This position is ideal for graduates interested in supply chain management and hands-on experience with real industry systems and workflows.
